name: MedConnections
tag_list: mobile-health, mhealth, health2-0, patient-empowerment, health, healthcare, mobile, mobile-apps, pharmacy, pharmaceutical, medication
overview: MedConnections provides integrative mobile support for pharmacy visiting experience for consumers, including medication guide, pharmacy locator, prescription discount, medication compliance tools, and health forum. MedConnections’s mobile and web services enable all parties in healthcare industry, pharmaceutical companies, hospitals, insurance companies, pharmacies, to communicate with desired clients anytime anywhere.

video_embeds.description: This video demonstrates how to use iPharmacy to identify a blue XANAX pill by imprint, color and shape. See more high resolution pill pictures here http://medconnections.com/drugs/xanax.html. In addition to this handy pill ID feature, it includes discount
